ygData.subject: Thesis help........
ygData.msgSnippet: My thought on Everquest is that it is a game.  A game that i enjoy playing because it is a source of entertainment.  I enjoyed reading the books by JRR Tolkien
ygData.messageBody:
My thought on Everquest is that it is a game. A game that i enjoy playing because it is a source of entertainment. I enjoyed reading the books by JRR Tolkien and this game is based very closely on his literature if you have not noticed which i am sure everyone has.
I have been playing for about 3 months now. The game experience is awesome. You get to help others and there is a goal involved unlike television. In my opinion it is a great game, i hope others pick it up, i got my 14 year old sister to play it and now her and all her friends play together on it, they have a blast yet she has the sense to keep up with her homework and is still on the honor roll so there goes that theory of it making kids unable to conduct themselves in school. In accordance to the addiction side to it; it only will be your life IF you let it. There is NOTHING hypnotic about it by any means. You either choose to play or you don't. Those who play it 24-7 do so because they choose to and those who play it once a week also do so b/c they choose to do so.
Also i have a question about your thesis hon, how are you going to use this to help you? by quoting us? are you asking help from any other groups? do you play the game? My thought for you is that if you want the total experience of Everquest you should go out to the store and purchase it and try it out for yourself, that will add some pages to yoru paper and accordign to what server you choose i KNOW those of us who are on that server would be very happy to help you learn and get started!! It is a great game, i hope your paper goes well ! if you need more help just ask!
Melefante/20 Ranger/Tribunal Server
PsyKo <sibilant_ghost@...> wrote:In the defence of the game, Ben Stien was responsible
for his son playing this game in the first place. In
the opening game sequence in agreeing to the contract,
a person must be of lawful age or have the consent of
a parent or legal guardian. Unless of course, his
father didn't know, then his son was pursuing illegal
activities.

And, about his solution. Sending his son to boarding
school.... LMAO don't take the kid away from video
games, take video games away from the kid. I mean
SERIOUSLY. Any child that would not abide by the
house rules isn't too well raised anyway.. he says he
heard his son playing in the middle of the night... he
shoulda picked his kid up by the collar and beat the
ever lovin %^*$ out of him.... I gaurantee, he would
reconsider breaking the rules if he knew there would
be consiquences... obviously this kid had more
problems thanm just video games...

Don't even get me started about the suicidal punk on
48 hours either...... I hate to sound cold and
lacking in compassion, but quite frankly she asked for
the view of the players, she undoubtedly SAW 48 hours
in the first place, and it was most likely what
provoked the choice of senior thesis.

Peace out,
Marshun PsyKo
